Others: Rashid Khan will not be participating in the India v. Afghanistan T20I series 2024 due to a lower back surgery he underwent after the ICC Cricket World Cup 2023.
Rashid Khan has missed the BBL 2023-24 and will miss the upcoming SA20 as well.
Afghanistan captain Ibrahim Zadran stated that Rashid Khan is healing and will take some time to be available for selection.
In Rashid Khan's absence, Afghanistan's spin workload in India will be shared between Mujeeb Ur Rahman, Mohammad Nabi, Noor Ahmad, Qais Ahmad, and Sharafuddin Ashraf.
Qais Ahmad took the most wickets in Afghanistan's most recent match, a 2-1 T20I series victory over the UAE at the turn of the year.
Ibrahim Zadran believes that even without Rashid, there is enough firepower in his team.
The three-match T20I series will begin on January 11, 2024, in Mohali, with Indore and Bangalore hosting the second and third T20Is on January 14 and 17.
